Country Roads of Croatia | Insight Vacations | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Country Roads of Croatia 14 Days | Zagreb to Dubrovnik From Zagreb to Dubrovnik, explore Croatia’s rich heritage and dramatic landscapes. Wander Zagreb’s historic streets, ride a cave train through Slovenia’s Postojna Caves, and marvel at Plitviče Lakes’ turquoise beauty. Discover Roman ruins in Split, stroll the medieval alleys of Korčula, and relax on sun-soaked Hvar. Taste fresh oysters in Ston, cruise the Adriatic, and dine under the stars in Dubrovnik. With expert local guides, unique cultural encounters, and island-hopping adventures - this is the ultimate Croatian escape. Deal Details Travel Dates Apr - Oct 2026 Priced From $8,550 per person Enquire Now From Zagreb to Dubrovnik, explore Croatia’s rich heritage and dramatic landscapes. Wander Zagreb’s historic streets, ride a cave train through Slovenia’s Postojna Caves, and marvel at Plitviče Lakes’ turquoise beauty. Discover Roman ruins in Split, stroll the medieval alleys of Korčula, and relax on sun-soaked Hvar. Taste fresh oysters in Ston, cruise the Adriatic, and dine under the stars in Dubrovnik. With expert local guides, unique cultural encounters, and island-hopping adventures - this is the ultimate Croatian escape. Pricing 14 Days from $8,550* per person, twin share Based on 27 April 26 Departure Highlights Meet an Oyster Farmer in Ston Meet a local oyster farmer and learn about the cultivation of oysters, before enjoying a delicious Sea-to-Table tasting of fresh shellfish and local wine. Visit Postojna Cave Enter by mini-train into these world-famous cave systems, before walking through an illuminated fairyland of stalactites and stalagmites. Visit Emperor Diocletian's Palace in Split Explore above and below the Roman Emperor Diocletian's palace. A Local Expert guides you through labyrinthine streets to see St. Duje's, the Golden Gate and the Cellars. Inclusions 13 nights accommodation in hand picked centrally located hotels. Daily breakfast, 6 Dinners Learn about Habitat Conservation at Plitvice National Park Learn about the Tara community at Plitvice National Park Visit Emperor Diocletian's Palace in Split Korcula City Tour Dubrovnik City Tour Cruise to Ston Village by Private Boat Travelling with an experienced Travel Director. Travel throughout via customised air-conditioned coach with double the legroom Porterage, plus tips and gratuities at hotels and restaurants Itinerary Details Day 1 Welcome to Zagreb Day 2 Zagreb Day 3 Zagreb - Postojna - Opatija Day 4 Opatija - Istria - Pula - Rovinj - Opatija Day 5 Opatija - Plitvice Lakes National Park Day 6 Plitvice National Park - Zadar - Trogir - Splt Day 7 Split - Hvar Day 8 Hvar Day 9 Hvar - Korcula Day 10 Korcula Day 11 Korcula - Peljesac - Dubrovnik Day 12 Dubrovnik Day 13 Dubrovnik Day 14 Dubrovnik - Tour Concludes Terms & Conditions Prices are in NZD (unless specified otherwise) per person, in complete twin/double share accommodation (or single occupancy where specified), valid for new bookings only, subject to availability. Offers are capacity-controlled and may be reduced, changed, extended or withdrawn at any time, without notice. Unless specified, airfares (and often transfers) are additional. Pricing variations may occur due to fluctuations in currency exchange rates. Prices include savings/discounts where applicable and all taxes/charges (which are subject to change). Offers valid for travel originating in New Zealand only. Required deposit amounts and deposit/final payment dates vary by product booked. Deposits may or may not be refundable. Amendment and cancellation fees apply, which vary based on supplier. All products and itineraries are subject to change at the discretion of the supplier. Prices are based on cash, Eftpos, or Direct Credit payment only. We accept all major credit cards, however, processing fees apply. To be read in conjunction with the booking terms and conditions applicable for Insight Vacations. Please always refer to your World Travellers Consultant for full details. Travel documents & vaccination requirements are the responsibility of the individual traveller. Professional service fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
